headline: Alabama Power To Build State's First Utility-Scale Battery Storage System on Retired Power Plant Site
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / March 10, 2025 /Southern Company Alabama Power will develop the state's first utility-scale battery energy storage system (BESS) on the former Plant Gorgas site in Walker County, which reliably powered Alabama for ...

headline: Southern Company Again Named to Prestigious World’s Most Admired Companies List
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / March 10, 2025 /Southern Company was again named to FORTUNE's list of the World's Most Admired Companies for 2025. The company was listed No. 1 in the electric and gas utilities industry in social responsibility ...
